name: Go
description: Go is an open source programming language that makes it easy to build simple, reliable, and efficient software.

name: Visual Studio Code
description: Visual Studio Code is an open-source, cross-platform code editor for most programming languages & files, with amazing extensions and built-in space for terminals

name: AWS DevOps
description: AWS DevOps provides services to simplify provisioning and managing infrastructure, deploying application code, automating software release processes, and monitoring your application and infrastructure performance.

name: Microservices
description: Microservices arranges an application as a collection of loosely coupled services.

name: Yocto
description: The Yocto Project (YP) is an open source collaboration project that helps developers create custom Linux-based systems regardless of the hardware architecture.

name: SQLite
description: SQLite is a C-language library that implements a small, fast, self-contained, high-reliability, full-featured, SQL database engine.

name: GStreamer
description: GStreamer is an open source multimedia framework which allows handling a wide range of media content from simple Ogg/Vorbis playback, audio/video streaming to complex audio (mixing) and video (non-linear editing) processing.
